values: Biblical Foundations for Seeking God's Justice in a Sinful WorldBiblical Foundations for Seeking God's Justice in a Sinful World

The foundation of the gospel propels us to seek justice in this world which gives people what they deserve, and even more to seek grace which gives people better than they deserve.The foundation of the gospel propels us to seek justice in this world which gives people what they deserve, and even more to seek grace which gives people better than they deserve.
